text:
Created attachment 23376
Proposal patch

"Library" label in test plan are not I18N

In proposal patch, when I added the new library label in messages.properties, I18NEdit are sort alphabetically some fields.
creator: milamber@apache.org

text:
Thanks for the patch.

There are quite a few changed property values that don't seem necessary - AFAIK there's no need to add backslashes before : or ! etc, so I have removed those.

Added to SVN:

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=761663&view=rev
